desc: This project is a fully responsive UI clone of the Starlink landing page. It faithfully replicates the design and layout of Starlink's official site, highlighting the company's mission, services, and technological innovations.
about: This project is a meticulously crafted user interface clone of the Starlink landing page, designed to mirror the look and feel of the original website. The clone is built using HTML, CSS, SASS & JavaScript, ensuring a modern and responsive design that adapts seamlessly across various devices and screen sizes.

desc: This project is a fully responsive UI clone of the Blue Origin landing page. It replicates the design and layout of Blue Origin's official site, showcasing the company's mission, services, and achievements with high fidelity.
about: This project is a user interface clone of the Blue Origin landing page. Designed to closely replicate the visual and functional elements of the original site, this clone was developed using HTML, CSS, SASS & JavaScript to ensure a modern, responsive, and engaging user experience.

desc: A responsive password generator application designed to create secure and random passwords for users. It ensures strong security by generating passwords that can include a mix of letters, numbers, and special characters.
about:
This project is a robust password generator application developed using HTML, CSS & JavaScript. It allows users to generate strong, random passwords tailored to their specific needs.

  • Customizable Password Length
  • Character Type Filters:- Numbers, Symbols, Uppercase Letters, Lowercase Letters

desc: This project is a fully responsive landing page. The page provides an engaging and seamless user experience across all devices, showcasing the company's services and values.
about: This project is a fully responsive landing page for the company AboveSky(fictional), developed using HTML, CSS & JavaScript. The landing page is designed to provide a seamless and engaging user experience.

desc: This application provides comprehensive information about any country in the world. By searching for a country, users can access detailed data and see the country's location on a world map.
about:
'Where in the World' is a comprehensize web application designed to provide detailed information about countries around the globe. Developed using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, the REST Countries API & the Leaflet library this application allows users to retrieve data about specific countries and visualize their locations on a world map. Features:-

  • Search any country & Get data about that country.
  • See country on world map.
  • Auto suggestion search box
  • If you search the wrong country then a popup slider will come out to display error.

desc: This project is a fully functional music player built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It allows users to play, pause, and navigate through a collection of songs with ease, providing an intuitive and engaging audio experience.
about:
This project is fully responsive music player application developed using HTML, CSS & JavaScript. Designed to offer an intuitive and enjoyable user experience, this music player allows users to play, pause, skip tracks and manage their playlist seamlessly across various devices. Features:-

  • While song is playing, if you double click on the img then img start rotating. For stop the rotating do the same.
  • Loop the song.
  • Change the music duration by draging the playback bar.

desc: This project is a static e-commerce webpage where users can browse products, add items to their cart, and remove items as needed. Click on cart button to see their products.
about:
This project is a simple yet functional e-commerce page developed using HTML, CSS & JavaScript. Feature:-

  • Used localSotrage, So, if you refresh the page your item will be there.
  • Checkout Slider.

desc: Dive into the nostalgic fun of Pong, recreated with modern web technologies. This game is built using HTML, CSS & JS. Challenge a friend or play against the computer, and enjoy a smooth, responsive gaming experience that works perfectly across all devices.
about:
Feature:-

  • You can play against computer or human(secondplayer). Play against seconplayer is only available for mobile and Tabs
  • Choose the no. of round
  • There is an button for exit, pause, play, mute & help(to know about game more)
  • Used Gsap libraray for animation(In text animation & Start Button). Start Button animation is only visible in computer(hover devices)
  • Used window.requestAnimationFram() for changing the ball positon.

desc: Experience the classic Tic Tac Toe game brought to life with modern web technologies. This game is designed using HTML, CSS & JavaScript. It is responsive design that works seamlessly across devices
about:
Feature:-

  • Reset & Sound Button for restart the game and mute respectively.
  • Game will automatically reset after 1 second draw or someone win the game
